availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry Beaven (Loretto, Marion County, Kentucky farmer)

body.p: Loretto, Marion County, Kentucky farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Charles and Cecilia Beaven. Farmer in Marion County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, District 1, p. 535.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, New Market, p. 18.
Find A Grave, "Henry Beaven (March 31, 1829-March 31, 1888)," Memorial #5408584, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/5408584 (accessed February 1, 2019).
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Marion County Marriages, Film #001929414, p. 19.
